NicoAxis = enum
  pcXAxis, pcYAxis, pcXAxis2, pcYAxis2, pcLTrigger, pcRTrigger
  Source   Edit 
NicoButton = enum
  pcLeft = "Left", pcRight = "Right", pcUp = "Up", pcDown = "Down", pcA = "A",
  pcB = "B", pcX = "X", pcY = "Y", pcL1 = "L1", pcL2 = "L2", pcL3 = "L3",
  pcR1 = "R1", pcR2 = "R2", pcR3 = "R3", pcStart = "Start", pcBack = "Back"
  Source   Edit 
NicoController = ref object
  kind*: NicoControllerKind
  name*: string
  when not false:
      sdlController*: GameController

  id*: int
  axes*: array[NicoAxis, tuple[current, previous: float, hold: int]]
  buttons*: array[NicoButton, int]
  deadzone*: float
  invertX*: bool
  invertY*: bool
  useRightStick*: bool
